net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_SavedAttacks_applyUI
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Presents a panel to choose what attack is applied and any modifiers to the attack

arg(0) = Optional: Currently active Rolled Expression index.
arg(1) = Optional: A copy of the rolled expressions so that changes don't mess up the UI
arg(2) = Optional: The set of selected IDs
arg(3) = Optional: Options previously selected by the user

Calls the dnd5e_SavedAttacks_apply macro with the chosen options.
